articles.title: Masters 2022: In-form American and World No. 1 Scottie Scheffler emerges champion at Augusta - WION
articles.description: In-form American and current world No. 1, Scottie Scheffler carded a final round 71 at the famed Augusta National to earn his first major title and fourth win on the PGA Tour here on Sunday. Scheffler, who went 10-under for the tournament, finishing three str…
articles.content: In-form American and current world No. 1, Scottie Scheffler carded a final round 71 at the famed Augusta National to earn his first major title and fourth win on the PGA Tour here on Sunday. Scheffle… [+3604 chars]
